name: Morning Star Volume Surge ETF Strategy
description: Trades a diversified basket of equity and commodity proxies using a candlestick-volume confirmation logic. A confirmed Morning-Star-like reversal (approximated via engulfing pattern component) with ≥150 % of 20-day average volume triggers entry; exits are managed by 5-EMA close, volume fade, 1.5 % stop or 4 % target, whichever comes first. Risk per position is capped at 2 % of portfolio via Fixed-Fraction sizing.
